frontmatter.title: AI Assistant Development and Optimization Intern

node.html:
• Enhanced a Gemini-based AI assistant, improving domain-specific response accuracy by 30%
  • Optimized chatbot integration within a Symfony + Nest.js stack and implemented agent handover, boosting operational efficiency
  • Developed an analytics dashboard to track tickets and conversation conversion rates, enabling data-driven decisions and improving support efficiency by 25%
  • Performed systematic bug fixes and refinements, reducing errors by 30% and increasing overall system stability
  • Technologies used: Nest.js, Symfony

• Boosted course management efficiency by 40% and bookings by 20% via a JavaFX desktop app
  • Utilized technologies such as JavaFx, Maven, MySQL, and APIs
  • Technologies used: Vue.js, Java

• Implemented brand guidelines into web elements and digital assets, ensuring a consistent and cohesive online identity
  • Coordinated with the social media team to develop and integrate web components that supported overarching brand campaigns

• Modernized a legacy system into a scalable doctor appointment web application, serving 200+ doctors
  • Integrated patient medical files to significantly improve user experience and accessibility, reducing appointment booking time by 60%
  • Handled 1,000+ monthly appointments with zero downtime through optimized architecture

• Maintained and enhanced the organization's website, improving functionality and user experience
  • Developed automated tools and scripts to streamline content generation and ensure brand consistency across digital platforms

• Engineered a real-time video analysis system using Django and ML to assess learner sentiment, processing 500+ hours of video content
  • Integrated AI/ML frameworks to analyse learner sentiments and track progress, achieving 87% sentiment detection accuracy
  • Reduced manual assessment time by 75% through automated sentiment analysis and progress tracking
  • Technologies used: Python, Django, React.js
